import React from "react"; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { airportsFetchData } from '../../redux/search/airports/actions'; import { ticketsFetchData } from '../../redux/search/tickets/actions'; class CardsCarousel extends React.Component { static propTypes = { classes: PropTypes.object.isRequired, airports: PropTypes.array.isRequired, ticketsFetchData: PropTypes.func.isRequired, airportsFetchData: PropTypes.func.isRequired, tickets: PropTypes.array.isRequired, }; onSubmit = async (values) => { this.props.ticketsFetchData('/search-request', values); return this.props.tickets; }; render() { const { classes } = this.props; return (
onSubmit={this.onSubmit} render={({ handleSubmit })} => (

Cheap flight offers**

Riga From Minsk $115 Warsaw From Kiev $125 Vilnius From Moscow $150 Kiev From Minsk $150 Kiev From Tallinn $150 Amsterdam From Warsaw $125 )
) } } export default CardsCarousel;
